section.name: Installing the Mod4j plug-in into Eclipse, using the Eclipse Update Manager
section.p:
The Mod4j Eclipse plug-in can be installed from the Mod4j update site:
Mod4j update site: http://mod4j.org/updatesite/3.5

ol.li: In Eclipse navigate to: Help, Install New Software...
Choose the option Search for new features to install and click on Next.
To create a new remote site for Mod4j, click on New Remote Site.
Enter the URL: http://mod4j.org/updatesite/3.5 and click on OK
Next you can select the Mod4j features of your choice. Complete the wizard to install the chosen features.
